sn33.6-10:1.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho vacchagotto paribbājako bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn33.6-10:1.3: “ko nu kho, bho gotama, hetu, ko paccayo, yānimāni anekavihitāni diṭṭhigatāni loke uppajjanti—
sn33.6-10:1.4: sassato lokoti vā, asassato lokoti vā …pe…
sn33.6-10:1.5: neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā”ti?
sn33.6-10:1.11: viññāṇe kho, vaccha, adassanā …pe… viññāṇanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya adassanā …pe….
